department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: small piece of birch bark (pink on one side, white on back) with flower-like design in brown; framed with glazing on both sides
dimension:
2 11/16 x 2 13/16 in. (6.83 x 7.14 cm) (sight, recto and verso)
9 7/8 x 9 7/8 in. (25.08 x 25.08 cm) (outer frame)
markings: on back, on mat below opening, on label: [CREE BIRCHBITE TRANSPARENCY/ BY/ MRS. MERASITY/ OF/ BEAVER LAKE, SASKATCHWAN/ A design that served as a model for bedding/ and that once held religious significance.]
title: Bitten Pattern
